00030 class NMFALSUpdate
00031 {
00032  public:
00034   NMFALSUpdate() { }

00036   template<typename MatType>
00037   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)

00039       (void)dataset;

00055   template<typename MatType>
00056   inline static void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00057                              arma::mat& W,
00058                              const arma::mat& H)
00059   {
00060     // The call to inv() sometimes fails; so we are using the psuedoinverse.
00061     // W = (inv(H * H.t()) * H * V.t()).t();
00062     W = V * H.t() * pinv(H * H.t());
00063 
00064     // Set all negative numbers to machine epsilon
00065     for (size_t i = 0; i < W.n_elem; i++)
00066     {
00067       if (W(i) < 0.0)
00068       {
00069         W(i) = 0.0;
00070       }
00071     }
00072   }
00073 
00086   template<typename MatType>
00087   inline static void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00088                              const arma::mat& W,
00089                              arma::mat& H)
00090   {
00091     H = pinv(W.t() * W) * W.t() * V;
00092 
00093     // Set all negative numbers to 0.
00094     for (size_t i = 0; i < H.n_elem; i++)
00095     {
00096       if (H(i) < 0.0)
00097       {
00098         H(i) = 0.0;
00099       }
00100     }
00101   }
00102 }; // class NMFALSUpdate
